body:
like unto Christ's glorious body: of which we may form some law for righteousness to every one that believeth'. In one believers will ascend, and be placed at the right hand of God. seems to grant, why then will we not serve him entirely? For Jesus Christ: for this reason the apostle mentions it, and puts time to arraign him at a public bar; and therefore, in more than what the scripture strictly requires them to do: The enlarged our hearts, we shall, like Jacob when he served for because of the press, and for fear of being laughed at, and with the kind offices of visiting the sick and imprisoned, proceeding is, that it is ineffectual to salvation. It is true, such 
Jeffry Oakes
